Save to Press again to exit Create Create folder File already exists Folder could not be created This permission allows TrebleShot to read and write to your device\'s storage for receiving and sharing files.

Already saved files can be moved to this folder. You will not see them in the see them in the same folder if you don\'t move them.
New files have been received Show Preparing files Saving details Version Pending Running Interrupted Resumed Unknown Long ago Wi-Fi Direct Wi-Fi Bluetooth Ethernet Unknown connection Text Connections Could not connect the device. Its address may have changed. Try reconnecting to the network while TrebleShot is open.
Choosing the best connection Retry receiving Ask Permission request Storage permission Permission to read phone state TrebleShot needs to access your device\'s serial number to create a long-term identity number, helping other devices recognize you
Media directory Emulated (%s) Not enough space Save path Transaction group details Used connection Removed Copy to clipboard TrebleShot can share files now Tap to end session ETA %s Show files Trust this device Type new entry Download Revise the text or press again to exit Save the text or press again to exit Update Save Only one text can be shared at a time Just now The default folder is not accessible to other apps TrebleShot needs permission to set up a hotspot TrebleShot hotspot Connect Disconnect You can send files directly via this open network created by a nearby TrebleShot device.
Connecting to the TrebleShot hotspot Connected devices may use your cellular data. You may want to turn it off.
Skip Searching for TrebleShot hotspot You can enable Wi-Fi to search for a TrebleShot hotspot Enable Allow TrebleShot to search and create hotspot Location Enable location service to see scan results and create hotspot

Help development Open Pause Retry No pending transfer left. To resume interrupted files, use \'Retry receiving\' option.
Your desired folder is not accessible. Files will be saved to the default folder. \n \n%s
Changelog Changelog You have updated TrebleShot, would you like to see what\'s new\?
You can always find \'Changelog\' in the \'About\' section
This requires internet connection Dark mode Use the dark style theme Allow Telegram channel · All transfers appear here Transfers Connections details Use known devices Scan QR Code Use existing networks Feedback & contact @string/butn_startHotspot @string/butn_useExistingNetwork @string/butn_scanQrCode @string/butn_useKnownDevice Sent Send text Start By adding devices, you share the same files with more devices. You will be taken back to the transfer when it is done.
Downloads Documents Shortcuts Recent files Change save path Failed to receive some files Send @string/text_send Choose an option to connect to the other device. For instance, if the other device is showing a QR code, use Scan QR code option.
Need a helping hand? Connection wizard Have you just set things up on the other device? Do you see a QR code (barcode) on its screen? Do you want the other device to connect to this device with hotspot (tethering)? If you don\'t know what hotspot is, tap to Yes.
Do you want to use your router or any Wi-Fi network that you and your friend connected to?
Do you want to access your previously contacted devices?
Yes No Load thumbnails Show thumbnails for files Manage devices Search Wi-Fi won\'t turn on. Turning Wi-Fi on Turn on location service first to continue Connect to a Wi-Fi network to continue Removing… Help @string/butn_help Choose Never The hotspot was started externally. Dismiss Two-row layout Display two rows next to each other Choose sharing method Found no activity that can do this action TrebleShot to TrebleShot The host is unknown to system The libraries shown here may not be directly involved in the final product. Theme Dark Light Follow system theme Battery Saver decides The maximum number of networks that can be added by TrebleShot exceeded. Please remove previously added unused networks to continue.
Open settings TrebleShot was disallowed to suggest networks. For this feature to work as intended, please allow it in the settings.
Failed to add network specifications due to some internal error.
